participant_1.background:
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.
I currently rent my home.
i volunteer at the red cross on the weekends.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
i like the band queens of the stone age.

participant_2.background:
I like to change my hair color based on the stories I collect.
My music taste is different from my parents' generation.
I enjoy cooking my favorite Asian food with my son.
I am a librarian who is afraid to tell my girlfriend about the romance novel I found for her.
i am in gymnastics.

content.text: Hello, what are your interests?
Hello, I'm interested in music, reading, and gymnastics.
What kind of music do you like?
My music taste is different from my parents' generation. I like to listen to bands like Queens of the Stone Age and Tool.
Oh, I love Tool! I've seen them in concert a few times.
That's awesome! They're one of my favorite bands.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially interested in historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of books about the Roman Empire lately.
That's cool! I've never read any books about the Roman Empire. I'll have to check some out.
You should! They're really interesting.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What else do you like to do?
I love to cook. I'm always trying new recipes. I recently made a really good dish of pad thai.
That sounds delicious! I love pad thai.
Me too! I make it for my son all the time.
That's nice of you.
Yeah, I love spending time with him. He's my best friend.
It sounds like you have a great life.
I do. I'm very lucky.
